value.name: The death of George Floyd: A look back 1 year later

value.name: Philonise Floyd Reflects on His Brother George's Legacy on First Anniversary of His Death
value.description: It's been one year since George Floyd's tragic murder on May 25, 2020, in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and his brother is speaking out about his legacy. On Tuesday, Philonise Floyd appeared on CNN's "New Day" to discuss the movement spurred by his brother's murder at the hands of former police officer Derek Chauvin and the issues of racial injustice in the year since.

value.name: When and how did George Floyd die?
